name: Jadoye Fekr Company
title: website
summary: Jadoye fekr company website with responsive design compatible on wide range of device such as mobiles, tablets and desktop computers with integration front-end development component such as layout and javascript functionality into a pre-existing framework.
explain:
Jadoye fekr company website with responsive design compatible on wide range of device such as mobiles, tablets and desktop computers with integration front-end development component such as layout and javascript functionality into a pre-existing framework.

created project in 2014 with multi language support and observance HTML5 & CSS3 standards.

Project features:

- Responsive design

- Multi language

- Customize SEO

- Manage users, programs, slideshow
